string.value: I found an altar within a deep sea cavern that was emitting cold energy. If I start a cold fire and throw in the black book, I should find out more about the content inside--but what to do after? Perhaps taking the new book to #b#p2060100##k will yield answers. \n\n#i4161017##t4161017# #b#c4161017# / 1#k
The book's identity has been revealed. It was #bCaron's Note#k! One journey ends as another begins...now to find out more!
This is #t4001108#. You can make the cold fire with this. Now let me ask a question again. Do you still want to know about this book?
Ok...don't forget:You can make the cold fire only on the #bcold altar#k, which is deep inside of the sea... Make a cold fire with #t4001108#, and burn the book with it to reveal its contents.

Go to the #bcave where the cold energy emerges from the deep sea#k. You will find what you were looking for there. Where is the cave? Do I have to tell you? If you really want it, you have to find it by yourself even if you have to search the entire ocean floor for it.
You don't want it? What, are you afraid now? Don't get cold feet...hahaha!
How do you feel...? Have you been to the cold altar? Good. You made the cold fire. I know. I can smell it on you.
Now, let's see what this book is about...Ah ha! It's #b#t4161017##k. I have heard about Caron. Let me keep reading...
Throw the book in the cold altar and cold fire. Don't come back until you get to know what the book is.
What? You lost #t4001108#? Don't you want to know about #t4001107#? I'll help you this time, but be more careful in the future!
